title: One Prompt Site Home Page
creator: OnePrompt
prompt:
Create a homepage for a project called "OnePromptSite" — a visually striking, modern directory that showcases websites created from a single AI prompt.

The purpose of this site is to demonstrate what is possible using AI to build entire sites from one prompt alone. It should feel cutting-edge, a little magical, and inspiring for creative technologists or curious onlookers. Let your design system shine — bold layout, clean UI, and playful touches are welcome.

Use the following JSON as the data source:
 - - REDACTED - - 

Each entry includes:

* title
* url
* previewImage (optional)
* creator
* prompt
* createdAt (ISO date)
* notes (optional)

For each site card:

* Show a screenshot preview using the `previewImage` URL if present.
* If missing, show a styled fallback visual block:

  * Include a clean, softly colored background
  * Bold title centered
  * Label like “Preview Not Available” or a clean SVG icon

Display the following details:

* Title (clickable, opens in new tab)
* Creator name
* Date created (formatted like "May 12, 2025")
* A dropdown or toggle section labeled "View Prompt" that expands to reveal the full prompt

  * Prompt should be displayed using <pre> or similar block that preserves all special characters, line breaks, and dashes
  * Include a “Copy Prompt” button inside the expanded section
* Only show `notes` if present

Design instructions:

* Typography should be beautiful, readable, and modern
* Responsive grid that feels good on both mobile and desktop
* Let spacing, color, and hierarchy create flow
* Don’t over-constrain layout — use modern patterns and nice touches like hover effects or animated expands

At the top of the page:

* Site title: "OnePromptSite"
* Tagline: "Exploring what’s possible with a single prompt."

Footer:

* Centered message: “Built with AI · One prompt at a time”

Include:

* Favicon
* SEO metadata (title: OnePromptSite, description: A growing archive of websites built with one prompt alone.)

Avoid including any contact forms or editing tools. This is a public-facing gallery powered entirely by the JSON feed.

title: one prompt gym bro
creator: OnePrompt
prompt:
Create a fully functional, mobile-first single-gym website named "onepromptGymBro" that includes:

A public-facing user view
A gym owner/admin dashboard
Toggle-based layout switching with proper state management
Design should reflect brands like F45 or CrossFit — clean, bold, minimal, and optimized for mobile.

---
Header & Toggle Controls (Responsive & Functional)

Fixed top nav bar with onepromptGymBro logo
View toggle with 2 options:
“User View”
“Admin View”
On mobile:
Use a dropdown or tab switcher for compact toggle
Ensure tap targets are touch-friendly
Clicking a toggle:
Updates a viewMode value in localStorage (e.g., user, admin)
Re-renders the page content based on the selected mode
On page load:
Check localStorage for last used viewMode
Default to "User View" if none found
Each view must conditionally render its section — only one active view at a time
---
User View (Public Site)

Hero section with gym branding and CTA
Enquiry form (name, email, phone, message)
Stores to localStorage and shows confirmation
Daily Workout (pulls latest "Published" workout)
Class Schedule (pre-filled or synced from Admin)
Mobile-friendly footer
---
Admin View (Gym Owner Dashboard)

Leads Panel
Table of enquiries with notes + follow-up email
“Convert to Member” opens modal with sign-up
Members Panel
List of members with editable info
Send Welcome/Exit emails
Workout Manager
Add/edit/delete workouts, mark one as “Published”
Class Scheduler
Weekly grid of gym classes with fields
---
Data Handling

All data in localStorage: enquiries, members, workouts, schedules
View toggle must persist and reflect changes live
---
Styling

Responsive layout, sticky headers, collapsible panels on mobile
Tabs, cards, and modals for clean UX
---
User Stories

As a visitor, I want to submit a contact form.
As a visitor, I want to view the daily workout.
As a visitor, I want to browse the class schedule. 4–11. As a gym owner, I want to manage leads, members, workouts, and schedules with proper feedback and flow.
---
Build Guidelines

No backend, only localStorage
View toggle must:
Set viewMode in localStorage
Load correct view on refresh
Ensure only active view content is rendered
